it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Interface Attack


  • public interface Attack
    This interface schematizes an attack, which is the effect that a weapon has on one or more targets

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Damageable> execute()
      This method returns the damageables this attack was dealt on
      java.util.List<Coin> getCost()
      This method returns the cost of the attack
      java.lang.String getName()
      This method returns a String representing the name of the Attack
      java.util.List<java.util.List<Damageable>> getTargets()
      This method returns the list of Damageable that it can target based on their position and potential further restrictions
      void selectTarget(@NotNull Damageable target, @NotNull TargetType targetType)
      This method will deal to the target the kind of damage planned for its type

    • Method Detail

      • getTargets

        java.util.List<java.util.List<Damageable>> getTargets()
        This method returns the list of Damageable that it can target based on their position and potential further restrictions
        Returns:
        a list of the groups of targets that can be attacked, which will be empty if none are available

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        This method returns a String representing the name of the Attack
        Returns:
        the name of the attack

      • selectTarget

        void selectTarget(@NotNull
                  @NotNull Damageable target,
                  @NotNull
                  @NotNull TargetType targetType)
        This method will deal to the target the kind of damage planned for its type
        Parameters:
        target - the Damageable chosen for this attack
        targetType - the kind of damage that should be applied among the ones available

      • getCost

        java.util.List<Coin> getCost()
        This method returns the cost of the attack
        Returns:
        the cost that shall be paid to use this attack, the list will be empty if the attack is free

      • execute

        java.util.List<Damageable> execute()
        This method returns the damageables this attack was dealt on
        Returns:
        the list of Damageable affected by this attack, the list will be empty if no one was affected
